description: The created_by_ref property specifies the id property of the identity object that describes the entity that created this object.
The object_marking_refs property specifies a list of id properties of marking-definition objects that apply to this object.

The object_marking_refs property specifies a list of id properties of marking-definition objects that apply to this object.
Specifies the ownership attributes of a file as a reference to a User Account Object. The object referenced in this property MUST be of type user-account.
Specifies the the high level properties of a portable executable file. The object referenced in this property MUST be of type software.
The object_marking_refs property specifies a list of id properties of marking-definition objects that apply to this object.
Specifies the source ip address of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type ipv4-addr or ipv6-addr.
Specifies the destination ip address of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type ipv4-addr or ipv6-addr.
Specifies the source operating system of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type software
Specifies the destination operating system of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type software.
Specifies the source application of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type software.
Specifies the destination application of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type software.
Specifies the source geographic location of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type x-oca-geo.
Specifies the destination geographic location of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type x-oca-geo.
Specifies the source application user of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type user-account.
Specifies the destination application user of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type user-account.
Specifies the source database user of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type user-account.
Specifies the destination database user of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type user-account.
Specifies the source operating system user of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type user-account.
Specifies the destination operating system user of the finding, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type user-account.
List of objects reffering to x-ibm-ttp-tagging describing techniques tactics and procedures mapped to this finding, such as MITRE ATT&CK TTP's
References indicators of compromise related to this finding. Must be of type file, ipv4-addr, ipv6-addr, domain, url
The object_marking_refs property specifies a list of id properties of marking-definition objects that apply to this object.
The object_marking_refs property specifies a list of id properties of marking-definition objects that apply to this object.
references the ip addresses related to this host. must be ipv4-addr or ipv6-addr
references the mac addresses related to this host. must be of type mac-addr
Specifies the operating system of the asset, as a reference to the Cyber-observable Object. The object referenced must be of type software
references the geolocation of this host. must be of type x-oca-geo
The object_marking_refs property specifies a list of id properties of marking-definition objects that apply to this object.
references the original raw event data. must be of type artifact
references the host related to this event. must be of type x-oca-asset
references a url related to this event. must be of type url
references a file related to this event. must be of type file
references a process related to this event. must be of type process
references a parent process related to this event. must be of type process
references the target process in case of a cross process event. must be of type process
references a domain related to this event. must be of type domain-name
references windows registry data related to this event. must be of type windows-registry-key
references network traffic related to this event. must be of type network-traffic
references any ip addresses related to this event. must be of type ipv4-address or ipv6-address
references the user related to this event. must be of type user-account
References any TTP (techniues tactics and procedures) related to this event. must be of type x-ibm-ttp-tagging
The object_marking_refs property specifies a list of id properties of marking-definition objects that apply to this object.
